description.text: The aim of this submodule is to describe any network service that handles the communication by Southbound interface

reference.text: RFC 7950 - The YANG 1.1 Data Modeling Language

description.text: Represents the services of the Southbound
Represents the relationship to ietf-ServiceAccessPoint by the ServiceSAPDependency through the Southbound Interface
Represents the relationship to ietf-ServiceAccessPoint by the ProvidesEndpoint through the Southbound Interface

The property SBIProtocol may specify that the southbound communication uses the OpenFlow protocol, which defines a Secure Channel in switches for communicating with external controllers and updating internal flow tables.
